entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
